settings.heading: About Us
settings.subheading: We want to see you smile, so we focus on your teeth.

settings.content:
Lumos Smile began with one idea and that is to provide professional dentist qualitly teeth whitening to everybody at an affordable price.

Everyone’s smile is unique, we’re here to help you show it to the world.

Not only are dentist visits expensive and time consuming, but they often end with an upsell that leaves you wondering: “are my teeth really that bad?”

We’re here to tell you “they’re not.” And we know. We used to work for dentists.


We saw a better way to provide people what they really want from the dentist: to feel better about their teeth. To smile confidently.


So we started Lumos with a simple idea in mind:

settings.html:
Kate Hernandez,

LDH & CEO

We designed our products with absolute simplicity in mind, plus you’re assured dedicated support from our ex-dental surgeons any time, should you need.

Zoe Wilson

CMO

We designed our products with absolute simplicity in mind, plus you’re assured dedicated support from our ex-dental surgeons any time, should you need.

settings.heading: Our Promise to You
settings.content:
We believe that outcomes can only be as good as the training and experience of the people designing treatment. So we work exclusively with a carefully curated network of expert orthodontists, not general dentists or “dental professionals.”

We believe that you should feel supported and empowered before, during, and after treatment. So we’ll make sure you have all the information you need to navigate your care, and we’ll always be here to answer questions.

We believe that you deserve the chance to make a change in your life. And we’ll do everything we can to help you get there.

settings.heading: Helping Kids Smile
settings.html:
We’re working with Smile Tree, the international children’s charity, to help provide critically needed oral health care and education to children in the remotest regions of Guatemala, Nepal, India, Vietnam, and soon more countries.

Read More About How We Give Back

settings.heading: Join The Team
settings.content: What to be part of the smile bright movement? Come work with us and help people all over the world show off their bright white bite.
